tools.name: list-calendars
tools.description: List all Google Calendar calendars accessible to the user

tools.name: list-events
tools.description: List upcoming events from a Google Calendar. Optional flags: --calendar-id=, --time-min=, --time-max= (RFC3339), --max-results=, --single-events=, --order-by=

tools.name: get-event
tools.description: Get details of a specific calendar event. Required: --event-id=. Optional: --calendar-id=

tools.name: search-events
tools.description: Search calendar events by text query. Required: --query=. Optional: --calendar-id=, --time-min=, --time-max=, --max-results=

tools.name: create-event
tools.description: Create a new calendar event. Required: --summary=, --start=, --end= (RFC3339 or YYYY-MM-DD). Optional: --calendar-id=, --description=, --location=, --attendees= (comma-separated emails), --timezone=

tools.name: update-event
tools.description: Update an existing calendar event. Required: --event-id=. Optional: --calendar-id=, --summary=, --description=, --location=, --start=, --end=, --attendees=

tools.name: delete-event
tools.description: Delete a calendar event. Required: --event-id=. Optional: --calendar-id=

tools.name: respond-to-event
tools.description: Respond to a calendar event invitation. Required: --event-id=, --response= (accepted/declined/tentative). Optional: --calendar-id=

tools.name: show-calendar
tools.description: Interactive calendar view showing events in a month/week grid with ability to add and delete events

tools.name: gcal-list-events-app
tools.description: List events for a date range (app-only, used by show-calendar UI)

tools.name: gcal-create-event-app
tools.description: Create an event (app-only, used by show-calendar UI)

tools.name: gcal-delete-event-app
tools.description: Delete an event (app-only, used by show-calendar UI)

tools.name: gcal-get-event-app
tools.description: Get event details (app-only, used by show-calendar UI)
